14/*! \file */
15
16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <stdbool.h>
19#include <stddef.h>
20
21#include <isc/hash.h>
22#include <isc/mem.h>
23#include <isc/mutex.h>
24#include <isc/once.h>
25#include <isc/util.h>
26
27#include <dns/db.h>
28#include <dns/ecdb.h>
29#include <dns/lib.h>
30#include <dns/result.h>
31
32#include <dst/dst.h>
33
34
35/***
36 *** Globals
37 ***/
38
39LIBDNS_EXTERNAL_DATA unsigned int dns_pps = 0U;
40
41
42/***
43 *** Functions
44 ***/
45
46static isc_once_t init_once = ISC_ONCE_INIT;
47static isc_mem_t *dns_g_mctx = NULL;
48static dns_dbimplementation_t *dbimp = NULL;
49static bool initialize_done = false;
50static isc_mutex_t reflock;
51static unsigned int references = 0;
52
53static void
54initialize(void) {
55 isc_result_t result;
56
57 REQUIRE(initialize_done == false);
58
59 result = isc_mem_create(0, 0, &dns_g_mctx);
60 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
61 return;
62 dns_result_register();
63 result = dns_ecdb_register(dns_g_mctx, &dbimp);
64 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
65 goto cleanup_mctx;
66
67 result = dst_lib_init(dns_g_mctx, NULL);
68 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
69 goto cleanup_db;
70
71 isc_mutex_init(&reflock);
72
73 initialize_done = true;
74 return;
75
76 cleanup_db:
77 if (dbimp != NULL)
78 dns_ecdb_unregister(&dbimp);
79 cleanup_mctx:
80 if (dns_g_mctx != NULL)
81 isc_mem_detach(&dns_g_mctx);
82}
83
84isc_result_t
85dns_lib_init(void) {
86 isc_result_t result;
87
88 /*
89 * Since this routine is expected to be used by a normal application,
90 * it should be better to return an error, instead of an emergency
91 * abort, on any failure.
92 */
93 result = isc_once_do(&init_once, initialize);
94 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
95 return (result);
96
97 if (!initialize_done)
98 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
99
100 LOCK(&reflock);
101 references++;
102 UNLOCK(&reflock);
103
104 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
105}
106
107void
108dns_lib_shutdown(void) {
109 bool cleanup_ok = false;
110
111 LOCK(&reflock);
112 if (--references == 0)
113 cleanup_ok = true;
114 UNLOCK(&reflock);
115
116 if (!cleanup_ok)
117 return;
118
119 dst_lib_destroy();
120
121 if (dbimp != NULL)
122 dns_ecdb_unregister(&dbimp);
123 if (dns_g_mctx != NULL)
124 isc_mem_detach(&dns_g_mctx);
125}
